definition: Poland/Polish/abbr. for 波蘭|波兰[Bo1 lan2]

sentences.english: Using low pass filters before the readout device may also reduce bandwidth.
sentences.chinese: 在读出设备之前采用低通滤波器也可以减小带宽。

sentences.english: The relation between the filter sampling time and cutting error is fuzzed .
sentences.chinese: 将滤波器的采样时间与剪切误差之间的关系模糊化。

sentences.english: The theory provided a new way to fabricate ultra-narrow optical filters.
sentences.chinese: 这将为设计一种全新的滤波器提供指导。

sentences.english: The last 4 times decimation was achieved by two half-band filters and a droop FIR.
sentences.chinese: 剩馀4倍抽取采用两级半带滤波器和升幅FIR实现。

sentences.english: Multi-scale edge detection based on over-sampled filter banks is studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究基于过采样滤波器组的多尺度边缘检测算法。

sentences.english: In addition, the manufacturing advantages known from E-plane technology are maintained.
sentences.chinese: 而且，双工器中的滤波器保持了E面的制造加工优势。

sentences.english: Formulas are derived for the solution of the transient currents of dissipative low-pass T-type electric wave filters.
sentences.chinese: 此篇先推求收端加电阻时，低频滤波器瞬流之公式。

sentences.english: This paper design a 4-step band pass digital filter.
sentences.chinese: 本文设计了一个4阶带通数字滤波器。

sentences.english: A novel method to suppress the spurious response of microstrip bandpass filter is proposed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 提出了新的抑制微带带通滤波器寄生通带的方法。

sentences.english: Metallized film capacitors & filters, VDE, UL, TUV approved.
sentences.chinese: 金属化薄膜电容器&滤波器，有VDE等多项认证。

sentences.english: Near perfect reconstruction cosine-modulated filter banks with high stop attenuation can be achieved using the proposed method.
sentences.chinese: 该方法可获得很高阻带衰减的余弦调制滤波器组。

sentences.english: New filters are costless in operation when used in HVDC power transmission system.
sentences.chinese: 新滤波器用在高压直流输电系统中将节省运行成本。

sentences.english: We use a new deblurring function that is easier to implement than inverse filter.
sentences.chinese: 采用了新的消模糊函数，它比起逆滤波器较易于制作。

sentences.english: Finally, the simulation results are given to testify that the notch filter can suppress the vibration effectively.
sentences.chinese: 最后，仿真结果证明了陷波滤波器抑制振动的有效性。

sentences.english: Also given is a simple technique to generate binary phase-only filters with CCD camera, PC/XT computer and photographic film.
sentences.chinese: 同时还给出了制作二元纯位相滤波器的简单方法。

sentences.english: Using steerable filters in wavelet analysis, a new algorithm is proposed in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 文中结合方向可调滤波器，给出了一种新的融合算法。

definition: filtering radio waves (i.e. to pick out one frequency)
harmonic (wave with frequency an integer multiple of the fundamental)
abbr. for 光耦合器[guang1 ou3 he2 qi4]
